nodes.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
nodes.title: Draftshot for Dribbble - Predict how popular your shot might be on Dribbble
nodes.author: Vladislav Len

localize.description: Draftshot是一款应用，它可以在你上传到Dribbble之前就预测你的镜头可能会有多受欢迎。无论是logo、网页设计还是插画，都不在话下。Draftshot使用机器学习来预测任何设计的受欢迎程度。
localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。
localize.tagline: 預測你的投籃在Dribbble上的受歡迎程度。

nodes.excerpt: Anicons is a pack of stylish and playful 3D icons that can be used instantly in your projects. The pack consists of 30 high-res, well-organized and commonly-used icons that can be customized easily.

localize.description: Anicons是一個時尚有趣的3D圖標包，可以立即用於你的項目中。該包由30個高分辨率、井然有序、常用的圖標組成，可以輕鬆定製。
localize.tagline: 一包可定製的3D圖標

nodes.excerpt: - Auto-resize your designs using our AI engine - Apply your brand kit across draft and finished designs - Choose from millions of images, graphics, and fonts - Thousands of curated templates for all your business needs - User-friendly drag-and-drop editor

nodes.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
nodes.title: Image Colorizer Repair - Repair old, damaged photographs and remove Scratches online
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: 基于人工智能技术，训练系统一键去除划痕，还原家庭老照片。如果没有高超的PhotoShop技术，是很难修复受损照片的。但现在，你只需3步，就能像专业人员一样完成!
localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 基於人工智能技術，訓練系統一鍵去除劃痕，還原家庭老照片。如果沒有高超的PhotoShop技術，是很難修復受損照片的。但現在，你只需3步，就能像專業人員一樣完成!
localize.tagline: 修復舊的，損壞的照片和去除劃痕在線。

nodes.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshop’s paint brush or Final Cut Pro’s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.
nodes.title: Editable - Annotate directly on any video files
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: Editable为你提供了一种最简单的方式，让你的视频直观地注释并轻松地标记起来。与Photoshop的画笔或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高质量的设计编辑器不同，它只是提供简单的注释体验。
localize.tagline: 直接对任何视频文件进行注释

localize.description: Editable爲你提供了一種最簡單的方式，讓你的視頻直觀地註釋並輕鬆地標記起來。與Photoshop的畫筆或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高質量的設計編輯器不同，它只是提供簡單的註釋體驗。
localize.tagline: 直接對任何視頻文件進行註釋

nodes.excerpt: Studio photography is no longer out of reach. Our full photo crew carefully hires models, designs scenes, and captures moments to offer you the best studio stock photos possible. With this new platform, you can find exactly what you need –or create it!
nodes.title: Moose Photos 3.0 by Icons8 - Free, studio-produced stock photos you can customize

localize.tagline: 免费，工作室制作的股票照片，你可以定制

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth
nodes.title: From Data-Driven to Data Everywhere - How to drive growth with user-facing analytics
nodes.author: Charles Miglietti

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。
localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

localize.description: 認爲你的公司是數據驅動的？可能吧。但你如何確保你的數據爲客戶創造真正的價值？在這本電子書中，您將學習如何使用您的數據。賦予你的客戶權力 🏆 改善你的產品供應 📈 推動持久的增長。
localize.tagline: 如何通過面向用戶的分析來推動增長？

localize.description: 一款功能強大的Mac*應用程序，用於... - 縮放像素 - 測量角度和距離 - 採樣顏色和維護調色板 - 檢查對齊 - 實時色盲和色彩對比 - 拍攝快照 - 實時距離和邊界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像專業人員一樣檢查應用程序、插圖和網站的用戶界面!

nodes.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.

nodes.excerpt: Remove objects from a video in less than 2 min using AI. ✂️ Remove dynamic objects, peoples, watermarks ✨ Add filters, turn your video into photos, GIF, audios 👋 Publish it in one click to seven platforms 🔎 Smart library to store your clips ✅ Try it for free

nodes.author: Thomas
